symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/sap_webcomponents/geomap.Positions
symbols.description:
Different types of positions on the map.

This enum is part of the 'sap/ui/geomap/gen/sap_webcomponents/geomap' module export and must be accessed by the property 'Positions'.

properties.name: BottomLeft
properties.description: Position of the control at the bottom left corner of the map.

properties.name: BottomRight
properties.description: Position of the control at the bottom right corner of the map.

properties.name: TopLeft
properties.description: Position of the control at the top left corner of the map.

properties.name: TopRight
properties.description: Position of the control at the top right corner of the map.

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/sap_webcomponents/geomap.SapGeomapDisplayedFeatures
symbols.description:
Different types of features display.

This enum is part of the 'sap/ui/geomap/gen/sap_webcomponents/geomap' module export and must be accessed by the property 'SapGeomapDisplayedFeatures'.

properties.name: All
properties.description: All features are displayed

properties.name: Clustered
properties.description: Only clustered points are displayed

properties.name: NotClustered
properties.description: Only not-clustered points are displayed

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/sap_webcomponents/geomap.SapGeomapScaleControlUnits
symbols.description:
Different types of units.

This enum is part of the 'sap/ui/geomap/gen/sap_webcomponents/geomap' module export and must be accessed by the property 'SapGeomapScaleControlUnits'.

properties.name: Imperial
properties.description: Units imperial

properties.name: Metric
properties.description: Units metric

properties.name: Nautical
properties.description: Units nautical

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/sap_webcomponents/geomap/dist/SapGeomap
symbols.description:
### Overview

The `sap-geomap` component is the main container of the SapGeomap webcomponent.

### ES6 Module Import

`import "@sap-webcomponents/geomap/dist/SapGeomap.js";`

properties.name: centerLng
properties.description: Longitude of the point where the map is centered

properties.name: centerLat
properties.description: Latitude of the point where the map is centered

properties.name: zoom
properties.description: Zoom level of the map - the bigger, the more the map is zoomed

properties.name: rotation
properties.description: Rotation of the map in degrees, counter-clockwise from the north

properties.name: tilt
properties.description: Tilt of the map in degrees (0-60) relative to the screen's plane

properties.name: restrictedAreaWestSouthPointLng
properties.description:
Latitude of the West-South point, defining the map's restricted area The restricted area is provided as a rectangle, defined by its bottom-left (West-South) and top-right (East-North) coordinates

**Note:** Setting all 4 `restrictedArea` properties to 0 removes the restriction

properties.name: restrictedAreaWestSouthPointLat
properties.description:
Longitude of the West-South point, defining the map's restricted area The restricted area is provided as a rectangle, defined by its bottom-left (West-South) and top-right (East-North) coordinates

**Note:** Setting all 4 `restrictedArea` properties to 0 removes the restriction

properties.name: restrictedAreaEastNorthPointLng
properties.description:
Latitude of the West-South point, defining the map's restricted area The restricted area is provided as a rectangle, defined by its bottom-left (West-South) and top-right (East-North) coordinates

**Note:** Setting all 4 `restrictedArea` properties to 0 removes the restriction

properties.name: restrictedAreaEastNorthPointLat
properties.description:
Longitude of the West-South point, defining the map's restricted area The restricted area is provided as a rectangle, defined by its bottom-left (West-South) and top-right (East-North) coordinates

**Note:** Setting all 4 `restrictedArea` properties to 0 removes the restriction

properties.name: minZoom
properties.description: The minimum allowed zoom level

properties.name: maxZoom
properties.description: The maximum allowed zoom level

properties.name: minTilt
properties.description: The minimum allowed tilt level

properties.name: maxTilt
properties.description: The maximum allowed tilt level

properties.name: text
properties.description: The text-content of the Web Component.

properties.name: width
properties.description: The 'width' of the Web Component in sap.ui.core.CSSSize.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The 'height' of the Web Component in sap.ui.core.CSSSize.

aggregations.name: items
aggregations.description: Describes the content of the map - provider, controls, markers, etc.

aggregations.name: mapControls
aggregations.description: Describes the controls of the map

events.name: mapCenter
events.description: The user changed the center of the map (dragged or zoomed)

events.name: mapClick
events.description: The user clicked on the map

events.name: mapMouseup
events.description: The user released the mouse button

events.name: mapMousemove
events.description: The user moved the mouse over the map

events.name: mapContextmenu
events.description: The user right-clicked on the map

events.name: mapError
events.description: The map has encountered an error

constructor.description: Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/sap_webcomponents/geomap/dist/SapGeomapArc
symbols.description:
### Overview

The `sap-geomap-arc` defines the Arc webcomponent.

### ES6 Module Import

`import "@sap-webcomponents/geomap/dist/SapGeomapArc.js";`

properties.name: beginLng
properties.description: Describes the longitude of the center of the starting point.

properties.name: beginLat
properties.description: Describes the latitude of the center of the starting point.

properties.name: endLng
properties.description: Describes the longitude of the center of the ending point.

properties.name: endLat
properties.description: Describes the latitude of the center of the ending point.

properties.name: steps
properties.description: Describes the number of steps to use in the arc and animation, more steps means a smoother arc and animation, but too many steps will result in a low frame rate.

properties.name: color
properties.description: Describes the color of the line.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Describes the width of the line.

properties.name: opacity
properties.description: Describes the opacity of the line.

properties.name: minZoom
properties.description: When the map's zoom property is less than this value, the layer will be hidden. Accepts values between 0 and 24.

properties.name: maxZoom
properties.description: When the map's zoom property is equal to, or greater than this value, the layer will be hidden Accepts values between 0 and 24.

properties.name: filter
properties.description: When set, only features, matching the filter, will be displayed

properties.name: displayedFeatures
properties.description: Determines which features the layer will display - All (default), only not-clustered, or only clustered Note: This property is ignored if the filter property is set Note: This property only makes sense when the layer is used for clustering (displays data from a sap-geomap-cluster-source element)

properties.name: hidden
properties.description: Determines if the layer is hidden.

properties.name: zIndex
properties.description: Describes the zIndex of the layer. The layer with the highest zIndex will be on top.

properties.name: text
properties.description: The text-content of the Web Component.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The 'height' of the Web Component in sap.ui.core.CSSSize.

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/sap_webcomponents/geomap/dist/SapGeomapCircle
symbols.description:
### Overview

The `sap-geomap-circle` defines the Circle webcomponent. SapGeomapCircle represent circles, defined in screen units (pixels). Rendered on the map as layers.

### ES6 Module Import

`import "@sap-webcomponents/geomap/dist/SapGeomapCircle.js";`

properties.name: lng
properties.description: Describes the longitude of the center of the circle.

properties.name: lat
properties.description: Describes the latitude of the center of the circle.

properties.name: radius
properties.description: Describes the radius of the circle.

properties.name: fillColor
properties.description: Describes the fill color of the circle.

properties.name: outlineColor
properties.description: Describes the outline color of the circle.

properties.name: outlineWidth
properties.description: Describes the width of the outline of the circle.

properties.name: opacity
properties.description: Describes the opacity of the circle.

properties.name: dragndrop
properties.description: Describes if the circle is draggable & editable.

properties.name: minZoom
properties.description: When the map's zoom property is less than this value, the layer will be hidden. Accepts values between 0 and 24.

properties.name: maxZoom
properties.description: When the map's zoom property is equal to, or greater than this value, the layer will be hidden Accepts values between 0 and 24.

properties.name: filter
properties.description: When set, only features, matching the filter, will be displayed

properties.name: displayedFeatures
properties.description: Determines which features the layer will display - All (default), only not-clustered, or only clustered Note: This property is ignored if the filter property is set Note: This property only makes sense when the layer is used for clustering (displays data from a sap-geomap-cluster-source element)

properties.name: hidden
properties.description: Determines if the layer is hidden.

properties.name: zIndex
properties.description: Describes the zIndex of the layer. The layer with the highest zIndex will be on top.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Describes the width of the layer.

properties.name: text
properties.description: The text-content of the Web Component.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The 'height' of the Web Component in sap.ui.core.CSSSize.

symbols.description:
### Overview

The `sap-geomap-circle-layer` defines the Circle Layer webcomponent.

### ES6 Module Import

`import "@sap-webcomponents/geomap/dist/SapGeomapCircleLayer.js";`

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/sap_webcomponents/geomap/dist/SapGeomapFillLayer
symbols.description:
### Overview

The `sap-geomap-fill-layer` defines the Fill Layer webcomponent.

### ES6 Module Import

`import "@sap-webcomponents/geomap/dist/SapGeomapFillLayer.js";`

properties.name: fillColor
properties.description: Describes the fill color of the layer.

properties.name: outlineColor
properties.description: Describe the outline color of the layer.

properties.name: opacity
properties.description: Describe the outline width of the layer.

properties.name: source
properties.description: ID of a sap-geomap-source element

properties.name: minZoom
properties.description: When the map's zoom property is less than this value, the layer will be hidden. Accepts values between 0 and 24.

properties.name: maxZoom
properties.description: When the map's zoom property is equal to, or greater than this value, the layer will be hidden Accepts values between 0 and 24.

properties.name: filter
properties.description: When set, only features, matching the filter, will be displayed

properties.name: displayedFeatures
properties.description: Determines which features the layer will display - All (default), only not-clustered, or only clustered Note: This property is ignored if the filter property is set Note: This property only makes sense when the layer is used for clustering (displays data from a sap-geomap-cluster-source element)

properties.name: hidden
properties.description: Determines if the layer is hidden.

properties.name: zIndex
properties.description: Describes the zIndex of the layer. The layer with the highest zIndex will be on top.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Describes the width of the layer.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The 'height' of the Web Component in sap.ui.core.CSSSize.

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/sap_webcomponents/geomap/dist/SapGeomapGeocircle
symbols.description:
### Overview

The `sap-geomap-geocircle` defines the Geo Circle webcomponent. SapGeomapGeocircle represents circles, defined in a real-world units (km, miles, etc.). Rendered on the map as layers.

### ES6 Module Import

`import "@sap-webcomponents/geomap/dist/SapGeomapGeocircle.js";`

properties.name: lng
properties.description: Describes the longitude of the center of the geo-circle.

properties.name: lat
properties.description: Describes the latitude of the center of the geo-circle.

properties.name: radius
properties.description: Describes the radius of the geo-circle.

properties.name: units
properties.description: Describes the units in which the radius is measured.

properties.name: fillColor
properties.description: Describes the color of the fill of the geo-circle.

properties.name: outlineColor
properties.description: Describes the outline color of the geo-circle.

properties.name: opacity
properties.description: Describes the opacity of the fill of the geo-circle.

properties.name: dragndrop
properties.description: Describes if the geocircle is draggable & editable.

properties.name: minZoom
properties.description: When the map's zoom property is less than this value, the layer will be hidden. Accepts values between 0 and 24.

properties.name: maxZoom
properties.description: When the map's zoom property is equal to, or greater than this value, the layer will be hidden Accepts values between 0 and 24.

properties.name: filter
properties.description: When set, only features, matching the filter, will be displayed

properties.name: displayedFeatures
properties.description: Determines which features the layer will display - All (default), only not-clustered, or only clustered Note: This property is ignored if the filter property is set Note: This property only makes sense when the layer is used for clustering (displays data from a sap-geomap-cluster-source element)

properties.name: hidden
properties.description: Determines if the layer is hidden.

properties.name: zIndex
properties.description: Describes the zIndex of the layer. The layer with the highest zIndex will be on top.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Describes the width of the layer.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The 'height' of the Web Component in sap.ui.core.CSSSize.

### Overview

The `sap-geomap-image` defines the Image webcomponent.

### ES6 Module Import

properties.name: url
properties.description: Url of the image to be displayed in the layer.

properties.name: opacity
properties.description: Describes the opacity of the image layer.

properties.name: minZoom
properties.description: When the map's zoom property is less than this value, the layer will be hidden. Accepts values between 0 and 24.

properties.name: maxZoom
properties.description: When the map's zoom property is equal to, or greater than this value, the layer will be hidden Accepts values between 0 and 24.

properties.name: filter
properties.description: When set, only features, matching the filter, will be displayed

properties.name: displayedFeatures
properties.description: Determines which features the layer will display - All (default), only not-clustered, or only clustered Note: This property is ignored if the filter property is set Note: This property only makes sense when the layer is used for clustering (displays data from a sap-geomap-cluster-source element)

properties.name: hidden
properties.description: Determines if the layer is hidden.

properties.name: zIndex
properties.description: Describes the zIndex of the layer. The layer with the highest zIndex will be on top.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Describes the width of the layer.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The 'height' of the Web Component in sap.ui.core.CSSSize.

aggregations.name: points
aggregations.description: Points describing the coordinates of the image.

returnValue.description: Value of property displayedFeatures

methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getDisplayedFeatures displayedFeatures}. Determines which features the layer will display - All (default), only not-clustered, or only clustered Note: This property is ignored if the filter property is set Note: This property only makes sense when the layer is used for clustering (displays data from a sap-geomap-cluster-source element) Default value is "All".

methods.description: Returns this layer's features, found at a point

methods.description: Returns the layer object in maplibre

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/sap_webcomponents/geomap/dist/SapGeomapLine
symbols.description:
### Overview

The `sap-geomap-line` defines the Line webcomponent.

### ES6 Module Import

`import "@sap-webcomponents/geomap/dist/SapGeomapLine.js";`

properties.name: color
properties.description: Describes the color of the line.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Describes the width of the line.

properties.name: opacity
properties.description: Describes the opacity of the line.

properties.name: dragndrop
properties.description: Describes if the line is draggable & editable.

properties.name: minZoom
properties.description: When the map's zoom property is less than this value, the layer will be hidden. Accepts values between 0 and 24.

properties.name: maxZoom
properties.description: When the map's zoom property is equal to, or greater than this value, the layer will be hidden Accepts values between 0 and 24.

properties.description: Determines which features the layer will display - All (default), only not-clustered, or only clustered Note: This property is ignored if the filter property is set Note: This property only makes sense when the layer is used for clustering (displays data from a sap-geomap-cluster-source element)

properties.name: hidden
properties.description: Determines if the layer is hidden.

properties.name: zIndex
properties.description: Describes the zIndex of the layer. The layer with the highest zIndex will be on top.

properties.name: fillColor
properties.description: Color of the fill of the layer of the polygon.

properties.description: Outline color of the layer of the polygon.

properties.name: opacity
properties.description: Opacity of the layer of the polygon.

properties.name: dragndrop
properties.description: Describes if the polygon is draggable & editable.

properties.name: minZoom
properties.description: When the map's zoom property is less than this value, the layer will be hidden. Accepts values between 0 and 24.

properties.name: maxZoom
properties.description: When the map's zoom property is equal to, or greater than this value, the layer will be hidden Accepts values between 0 and 24.

properties.name: filter
properties.description: When set, only features, matching the filter, will be displayed

properties.name: displayedFeatures
properties.description: Determines which features the layer will display - All (default), only not-clustered, or only clustered Note: This property is ignored if the filter property is set Note: This property only makes sense when the layer is used for clustering (displays data from a sap-geomap-cluster-source element)

properties.name: hidden
properties.description: Determines if the layer is hidden.

properties.name: zIndex
properties.description: Describes the zIndex of the layer. The layer with the highest zIndex will be on top.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Describes the width of the layer.

aggregations.name: points
aggregations.description: List of points that define the polygon. The first and the last points should always be the same.

properties.name: minZoom
properties.description: When the map's zoom property is less than this value, the layer will be hidden. Accepts values between 0 and 24.

properties.name: maxZoom
properties.description: When the map's zoom property is equal to, or greater than this value, the layer will be hidden Accepts values between 0 and 24.

properties.name: filter
properties.description: When set, only features, matching the filter, will be displayed

properties.name: displayedFeatures
properties.description: Determines which features the layer will display - All (default), only not-clustered, or only clustered Note: This property is ignored if the filter property is set Note: This property only makes sense when the layer is used for clustering (displays data from a sap-geomap-cluster-source element)

properties.name: hidden
properties.description: Determines if the layer is hidden.

properties.name: zIndex
properties.description: Describes the zIndex of the layer. The layer with the highest zIndex will be on top.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Describes the width of the layer.

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/sap_webcomponents/geomap/dist/SapGeomapSymbolLayer
symbols.description:
### Overview

The `sap-geomap-symbol-layer` defines the Symbol Layer webcomponent.

### ES6 Module Import

`import "@sap-webcomponents/geomap/dist/SapGeomapSymbolLayer.js";`

properties.name: text
properties.description: Text to be displayed in the layer.

properties.name: textSize
properties.description: Size of the font that is displayed in the layer. Units in pixels. Requires text-field.

properties.name: textColor
properties.description: Color of the text that is displayed in the layer.

properties.name: textAnchor
properties.description: Which part of the text is closest to the point: "center", "left", "right", "top", "bottom", "top-left", "top-right", "bottom-left", "bottom-right"

properties.name: textFont
properties.description: Font stack to use for displaying text. Defaults to Open Sans Regular,Arial Unicode MS Regular. Requires text-field.

properties.name: source
properties.description: ID of a sap-geomap-source element

properties.name: minZoom
properties.description: When the map's zoom property is less than this value, the layer will be hidden. Accepts values between 0 and 24.

properties.name: maxZoom
properties.description: When the map's zoom property is equal to, or greater than this value, the layer will be hidden Accepts values between 0 and 24.

properties.name: filter
properties.description: When set, only features, matching the filter, will be displayed

properties.name: displayedFeatures
properties.description: Determines which features the layer will display - All (default), only not-clustered, or only clustered Note: This property is ignored if the filter property is set Note: This property only makes sense when the layer is used for clustering (displays data from a sap-geomap-cluster-source element)

properties.name: hidden
properties.description: Determines if the layer is hidden.

properties.name: zIndex
properties.description: Describes the zIndex of the layer. The layer with the highest zIndex will be on top.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Describes the width of the layer.

events.name: layerMousedown
events.description: Mouse button down on the layer

events.name: layerMouseup
events.description: Mouse button up on the layer

constructor.description: Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

events.description: Mouse button down on the layer

events.name: layerMouseup
events.description: Mouse button up on the layer

methods.name: getDisplayedFeatures

returnValue.description: Value of property displayedFeatures

methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getDisplayedFeatures displayedFeatures}. Determines which features the layer will display - All (default), only not-clustered, or only clustered Note: This property is ignored if the filter property is set Note: This property only makes sense when the layer is used for clustering (displays data from a sap-geomap-cluster-source element) Default value is "All".

methods.name: getFeaturesAtPoint
methods.description: Returns this layer's features, found at a point

methods.name: getFilter

returnValue.description: Value of property filter

methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getFilter filter}. When set, only features, matching the filter, will be displayed Default value is {}.

methods.name: getHidden

returnValue.description: Value of property hidden

methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getHidden hidden}. Determines if the layer is hidden. Default value is false.

methods.name: getLayer
methods.description: Returns the layer object in maplibre

methods.name: getMaxZoom

returnValue.description: Value of property maxZoom

methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getMaxZoom maxZoom}. When the map's zoom property is equal to, or greater than this value, the layer will be hidden Accepts values between 0 and 24. Default value is 0.

methods.name: getMetadata

returnValue.description: Metadata object describing this class

methods.description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.ui.geomap.gen.sap_webcomponents.geomap.dist.SapGeomapSymbolLayer.

methods.name: getMinZoom

returnValue.description: Value of property minZoom

methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getMinZoom minZoom}. When the map's zoom property is less than this value, the layer will be hidden. Accepts values between 0 and 24. Default value is 0.

methods.name: getSource

returnValue.description: Value of property source

methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getSource source}. ID of a sap-geomap-source element Default value is empty string.

methods.name: getText

returnValue.description: Value of property text

methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getText text}. Text to be displayed in the layer. Default value is empty string.

methods.name: getTextAnchor

returnValue.description: Value of property textAnchor

methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getTextAnchor textAnchor}. Which part of the text is closest to the point: "center", "left", "right", "top", "bottom", "top-left", "top-right", "bottom-left", "bottom-right" Default value is "center".

methods.name: getTextColor

returnValue.description: Value of property textColor

methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getTextColor textColor}. Color of the text that is displayed in the layer. Default value is "black".

methods.name: getTextFont

returnValue.description: Value of property textFont

methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getTextFont textFont}. Font stack to use for displaying text. Defaults to Open Sans Regular,Arial Unicode MS Regular. Requires text-field. Default value is "[Arial Unicode MS Regular];".

methods.name: getTextSize

returnValue.description: Value of property textSize

methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getTextSize textSize}. Size of the font that is displayed in the layer. Units in pixels. Requires text-field. Default value is 0.

methods.name: getWidth

returnValue.description: Value of property width

methods.description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getWidth width}.

Describes the width of the layer.

methods.name: getZIndex

returnValue.description: Value of property zIndex

methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getZIndex zIndex}. Describes the zIndex of the layer. The layer with the highest zIndex will be on top. Default value is 0.

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents.AvatarGroupType
symbols.description:
Different types of AvatarGroupType.

This enum is part of the 'sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents' module export and must be accessed by the property 'AvatarGroupType'.

properties.name: Group
properties.description: The avatars are displayed as partially overlapped on top of each other and the entire group has one click or tap area.

properties.name: Individual
properties.description: The avatars are displayed side-by-side and each avatar has its own click or tap area.

Different Breadcrumbs designs.

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents.ButtonBadgeDesign
symbols.description:
Determines where the badge will be placed and how it will be styled.

This enum is part of the 'sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents' module export and must be accessed by the property 'ButtonBadgeDesign'.

properties.name: AttentionDot
properties.description: The badge is displayed as an attention dot.

properties.name: InlineText
properties.description: The badge is displayed after the text, inside the button.

properties.name: OverlayText
properties.description:
The badge is displayed at the top-end corner of the button.

**Note:** It's highly recommended to use the OverlayText design mode only in cozy density.

properties.description: attention type

properties.name: Default
properties.description: default type (no special styling)

properties.name: Emphasized
properties.description: emphasized type

properties.name: Negative
properties.description: reject style (red button)

properties.name: Positive
properties.description: accept type (green button)

properties.name: Transparent
properties.description: transparent type

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents.ButtonType
symbols.description:
Determines if the button has special form-related functionality.

This enum is part of the 'sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents' module export and must be accessed by the property 'ButtonType'.

properties.name: Button
properties.description: The button does not do anything special when inside a form

properties.name: Reset
properties.description: The button acts as a reset button (resets a form)

properties.name: Submit
properties.description: The button acts as a submit button (submits a form)

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents.CalendarSelectionMode
symbols.description:
Different Calendar selection mode.

This enum is part of the 'sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents' module export and must be accessed by the property 'CalendarSelectionMode'.

properties.name: Multiple
properties.description: Several dates can be selected

properties.name: Range
properties.description: A range defined by a start date and an end date can be selected

properties.name: Single
properties.description: Only one date can be selected at a time

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents.CalendarWeekNumbering
symbols.description: The CalendarWeekNumbering enum defines how to calculate calendar weeks. Each value defines: - The first day of the week, - The first week of the year. This enum is part of the 'sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents' module export and must be accessed by the property 'CalendarWeekNumbering'.

properties.name: Default
properties.description:
The default calendar week numbering:

The framework determines the week numbering scheme; currently it is derived from the active format locale. Future versions of ui5-webcomponents might select a different week numbering scheme.

properties.name: ISO_8601
properties.description: Official calendar week numbering in most of Europe (ISO 8601 standard): Monday is first day of the week, the week containing January 4th is first week of the year.

properties.name: MiddleEastern
properties.description: Official calendar week numbering in much of the Middle East (Middle Eastern calendar): Saturday is first day of the week, the week containing January 1st is first week of the year.

properties.name: WesternTraditional
properties.description: Official calendar week numbering in the United States, Canada, Brazil, Israel, Japan, and other countries (Western traditional calendar): Sunday is first day of the week, the week containing January 1st is first week of the year.

properties.name: Navigation

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents.CarouselPageIndicatorType

Different Carousel page indicator types.

This enum is part of the 'sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents' module export and must be accessed by the property 'CarouselPageIndicatorType'.

properties.name: Default
properties.description: The page indicator will be visualized as dots if there are fewer than 9 pages. If there are more pages, the page indicator will switch to displaying the current page and the total number of pages. (e.g. X of Y)

properties.name: Numeric
properties.description: The page indicator will display the current page and the total number of pages. (e.g. X of Y)

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents.IconMode
symbols.description:
Different Icon modes.

This enum is part of the 'sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents' module export and must be accessed by the property 'IconMode'.

properties.name: Decorative
properties.description: Decorative mode. Configures the component to internally render role="presentation" and aria-hidden="true", making it purely decorative without semantic content or interactivity.

properties.name: Image
properties.description: Image mode (by default). Configures the component to internally render role="img".

properties.name: Interactive
properties.description: Interactive mode. Configures the component to internally render role="button". This mode also supports focus and press handling to enhance interactivity.

properties.description: Indicates that the item is clickable via active feedback when item is pressed.

properties.name: Detail
properties.description: Enables detail button of the list item that fires detail-click event.

properties.name: Inactive
properties.description: Indicates the list item does not have any active feedback when item is pressed.

properties.name: Navigation
properties.description: Enables the type of navigation, which is specified to add an arrow at the end of the items and fires navigate-click event.

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents.ListSelectionMode
symbols.description:
Different list selection modes.

This enum is part of the 'sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents' module export and must be accessed by the property 'ListSelectionMode'.

properties.name: Delete
properties.description: Delete mode (only one list item can be deleted via provided delete button)

properties.name: Multiple
properties.description: Multi selection mode (more than one list item can be selected).

properties.name: None
properties.description: Default mode (no selection).

properties.name: Single
properties.description: Right-positioned single selection mode (only one list item can be selected).

properties.name: SingleAuto
properties.description: Selected item is highlighted and selection is changed upon arrow navigation (only one list item can be selected - this is always the focused item).

properties.name: SingleEnd
properties.description: Selected item is highlighted but no selection element is visible (only one list item can be selected).

properties.name: SingleStart
properties.description: Left-positioned single selection mode (only one list item can be selected).

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents.ListSeparator

properties.description: Separators between the items. Note: This enumeration depends on the theme.

properties.description: No item separators.

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents.PanelAccessibleRole

Panel accessible roles.

This enum is part of the 'sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents' module export and must be accessed by the property 'PanelAccessibleRole'.

properties.name: Complementary
properties.description: Represents the ARIA role "complementary". A section of the page, designed to be complementary to the main content at a similar level in the DOM hierarchy.

properties.name: Form
properties.description: Represents the ARIA role "Form". A landmark region that contains a collection of items and objects that, as a whole, create a form.

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents.TagDesign
symbols.description:
Defines tag design types.

This enum is part of the 'sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents' module export and must be accessed by the property 'TagDesign'.

properties.name: Critical
properties.description: Critical design

properties.name: Information
properties.description: Information design

properties.name: Negative
properties.description: Negative design

properties.name: Neutral
properties.description: Neutral design

properties.name: Positive
properties.description: Positive design

properties.name: Set1
properties.description: Set1 of generic indication colors that are intended for industry-specific use cases

properties.name: Set2
properties.description: Set2 of generic indication colors that are intended for industry-specific use cases

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents.TagSize
symbols.description:
Predefined sizes for the tag.

This enum is part of the 'sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents' module export and must be accessed by the property 'TagSize'.

properties.name: L
properties.description: Large size of the tag

properties.name: S
properties.description: Small size of the tag

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents.TextEmptyIndicatorMode
symbols.description:
Empty Indicator Mode.

This enum is part of the 'sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents' module export and must be accessed by the property 'TextEmptyIndicatorMode'.

properties.name: Off
properties.description: Empty indicator is never rendered.

properties.name: On
properties.description: Empty indicator is rendered always when the component's content is empty.

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents.TitleLevel
symbols.description:
Different types of Title level.

This enum is part of the 'sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents' module export and must be accessed by the property 'TitleLevel'.

properties.name: H1
properties.description: Renders `h1` tag.

properties.name: H2
properties.description: Renders `h2` tag.

properties.name: H3
properties.description: Renders `h3` tag.

properties.name: H4
properties.description: Renders `h4` tag.

properties.name: H5
properties.description: Renders `h5` tag.

properties.name: H6
properties.description: Renders `h6` tag.

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents.ToastPlacement
symbols.description:
Toast placement.

This enum is part of the 'sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents' module export and must be accessed by the property 'ToastPlacement'.

properties.name: BottomCenter
properties.description: Toast is placed at the `BottomCenter` position of its container. Default placement (no selection)

properties.name: BottomEnd
properties.description: Toast is placed at the `BottomEnd` position of its container.

properties.name: BottomStart
properties.description: Toast is placed at the `BottomStart` position of its container.

properties.name: MiddleCenter
properties.description: Toast is placed at the `MiddleCenter` position of its container.

properties.name: MiddleEnd
properties.description: Toast is placed at the `MiddleEnd` position of its container.

properties.name: MiddleStart
properties.description: Toast is placed at the `MiddleStart` position of its container.

properties.name: TopCenter
properties.description: Toast is placed at the `TopCenter` position of its container.

properties.name: TopEnd
properties.description: Toast is placed at the `TopEnd` position of its container.

properties.name: TopStart
properties.description: Toast is placed at the `TopStart` position of its container.

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents.ToolbarAlign
symbols.description:
Defines which direction the items of ui5-toolbar will be aligned.

This enum is part of the 'sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents' module export and must be accessed by the property 'ToolbarAlign'.

properties.name: End
properties.description: Toolbar items are situated at the `end` of the Toolbar

properties.name: Start
properties.description: Toolbar items are situated at the `start` of the Toolbar

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents.ToolbarDesign
symbols.description:
Defines the available toolbar designs.

This enum is part of the 'sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents' module export and must be accessed by the property 'ToolbarDesign'.

properties.name: Solid
properties.description: The toolbar and its content will be displayed with solid background.

properties.name: Transparent
properties.description: The toolbar and its content will be displayed with transparent background.

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents.ToolbarItemOverflowBehavior
symbols.description:
Defines the priority of the toolbar item to go inside overflow popover.

This enum is part of the 'sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents' module export and must be accessed by the property 'ToolbarItemOverflowBehavior'.

properties.name: AlwaysOverflow
properties.description: When set, the item will be always part of the overflow part of ui5-toolbar.

properties.name: Default
properties.description: The item is presented inside the toolbar and goes in the popover, when there is not enough space.

properties.name: NeverOverflow
properties.description: When set, the item will never go to the overflow popover.

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents.WrappingType
symbols.description:
Different types of wrapping.

This enum is part of the 'sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents' module export and must be accessed by the property 'WrappingType'.

properties.name: None
properties.description: The text will be truncated with an ellipsis.

properties.name: Normal
properties.description: The text will wrap. The words will not be broken based on hyphenation.

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents_base.AnimationMode
symbols.description:
Different types of AnimationMode.

This enum is part of the 'sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents_base' module export and must be accessed by the property 'AnimationMode'.

properties.name: Basic
properties.description: Basic

properties.name: Full
properties.description: Full

properties.name: Minimal
properties.description: Minimal

properties.name: None
properties.description: None

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents_base.CalendarType
symbols.description:
Different calendar types.

This enum is part of the 'sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents_base' module export and must be accessed by the property 'CalendarType'.

properties.name: Buddhist
properties.description: Buddhist

properties.name: Gregorian
properties.description: Gregorian

properties.name: Islamic
properties.description: Islamic

properties.name: Japanese
properties.description: Japanese

properties.name: Persian
properties.description: Persian

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents_base.ItemNavigationBehavior
symbols.description:
Different behavior for ItemNavigation.

This enum is part of the 'sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents_base' module export and must be accessed by the property 'ItemNavigationBehavior'.

properties.name: Cyclic
properties.description: Cycling behavior: navigating past the last item continues with the first and vice versa.

properties.name: Static
properties.description: Static behavior: navigations stops at the first or last item.

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents_base.MovePlacement
symbols.description:
Placements of a moved element relative to a target element.

This enum is part of the 'sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents_base' module export and must be accessed by the property 'MovePlacement'.

properties.name: After
properties.description: After

properties.name: Before
properties.description: Before

properties.name: On
properties.description: On

symbols.name: module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/ui5/webcomponents_base.NavigationMode
symbols.description:
Different navigation modes for ItemNavigation.

properties.name: Vertical

symbols.name: sap.ui.geomap
symbols.description: SAPUI5 library with sap.ui.geomap Note: The controls in this library integrate the Geomap Web Component providing support as standard UI5 controls.

symbols.name: sap.ui.geomap.Geomap
symbols.description: Geomap class wrapper for SapGeomap.

parameters.name: sId
parameters.description: ID for the new control, generated automatically if no ID is given

parameters.name: mSettings
parameters.description: initial settings for the new control

constructor.description: Constructor for a new sap.ui.geomap.Geomap control.

methods.name: extend

returnValue.description: Created class / constructor function

parameters.name: sClassName
parameters.description: Name of the class being created

parameters.name: oClassInfo
parameters.description: Object literal with information about the class

parameters.name: FNMetaImpl
parameters.description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to the metadata implementation used by this class

methods.description: Creates a new subclass of class sap.ui.geomap.Geomap with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo. oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link module:sap/ui/geomap/gen/sap_webcomponents/geomap/dist/SapGeomap.extend}.

methods.name: getMetadata

returnValue.description: Metadata object describing this class

methods.description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.ui.geomap.Geomap.
